footer.tagline: Connecting clients with trusted professionals worldwide through secure, verified transactions.

homepage.hero_subtitle: Secure payments, transparent tracking, mediation included
homepage.trusted_professionals_subtitle: Top-rated experts ready to help with your projects
homepage.secure_payment_desc: Pay safely on our platform with full encryption and protection for every transaction.
homepage.real_time_tracking_desc: Monitor project progress and payments live, with instant updates every step of the way.
homepage.mediation_included_desc: Get peace of mind—our team steps in to resolve any disputes quickly and fairly.
homepage.my_account_desc: Manage your profile, projects, and payment methods in one place.
homepage.browse_categories_desc: Explore all available services and find the perfect professional for your needs.
homepage.dispute_resolution_desc: Get peace of mind with our built-in mediation system to resolve any project disputes fairly.

how_to_accept_project_invite.title: How to Accept a Project Invite
how_to_accept_project_invite.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to accept and manage your project invitations on Safe Bill
how_to_accept_project_invite.step1_description: When a seller creates a project for you, you'll receive an email with a unique invitation code and project details.
how_to_accept_project_invite.email_preview_code: Your invitation code will appear here in a highlighted blue box
how_to_accept_project_invite.email_preview_note: The email will contain project details, quote information, and your unique invitation code
how_to_accept_project_invite.step2_description: Log into your Safe Bill account and navigate to your buyer dashboard where you'll find the 'Accept Project Invite' button.
how_to_accept_project_invite.dashboard_button_note: This will take you to your buyer dashboard
how_to_accept_project_invite.step3_description: Click the 'Accept Project Invite' button to access a simple form where you can paste your invitation code.
how_to_accept_project_invite.step4_description: After entering the code, you'll be redirected to view the complete project details including quotes, payment schedules, and terms.
how_to_accept_project_invite.step5_description: Once approved, the project appears in your dashboard where you can track progress, manage milestones, and handle payments.
how_to_accept_project_invite.note1: Invitation codes expire after 2 days for security reasons
how_to_accept_project_invite.note2: You must be logged in as a buyer to accept project invitations
how_to_accept_project_invite.note3: You can approve or reject projects based on your requirements
how_to_accept_project_invite.get_started_note: Ready to accept your first project invitation? Click the button above to begin!

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how Safe Bill collects, uses, and protects your information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content1: Safe Bill ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform for project management, milestone tracking, and secure payments between buyers and sellers.
introduction.content2: By using Safe Bill, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

personal_info.title: Personal Information
items: Name, email address, and contact information
Business information (company name, SIRET number, business type)
Profile information and preferences
Payment and billing information (processed securely through Stripe)

project_info.title: Project Information
items: Project details, descriptions, and requirements
Quotes, proposals, and project documents
Milestone information and completion status
Communication history between buyers and sellers

technical_info.title: Technical Information
items: IP address, browser type, and device information
Usage patterns and platform interactions
Cookies and similar tracking technologies
Log files and analytics data

cookie_policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookie_policy.subtitle: We use cookies to enhance your experience and ensure GDPR compliance.

essential_cookies.title: Essential Cookies
essential_cookies.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled. They are usually set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services.

analytics_cookies.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics_cookies.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing_cookies.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing_cookies.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites for advertising and marketing purposes.

consent_management.title: Consent Management
consent_management.description: We use Axeptio to manage your cookie preferences and ensure compliance with GDPR regulations. You can change your consent settings at any time.
consent_management.withdrawal: You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. Withdrawing consent will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal.

service_provision.title: Service Provision
service_provision.content: To provide, maintain, and improve our platform services, including project management, milestone tracking, and secure payment processing.

communication.title: Communication
communication.content: To send you important updates, notifications, and respond to your inquiries and support requests.

security_compliance.title: Security & Compliance
security_compliance.content: To ensure platform security, prevent fraud, and comply with legal obligations and regulations.

analytics_improvement.title: Analytics & Improvement
analytics_improvement.content: To analyze usage patterns, improve user experience, and develop new features and services.

information_sharing.title: Information Sharing
information_sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
information_sharing.service_providers: Service Providers: With trusted third-party service providers who assist in platform operations (e.g., Stripe for payments, email services)
information_sharing.legal_requirements: Legal Requirements: When required by law, court order, or to protect our rights and safety
information_sharing.business_transfers: Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
information_sharing.consent: Consent: When you explicitly consent to sharing your information

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:

access_portability.title: Access & Portability
access_portability.content: Request access to your personal data and receive it in a portable format

correction.title: Correction
correction.content: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information

deletion.title: Deletion
deletion.content: Request deletion of your personal data under certain circumstances

objection.title: Objection
objection.content: Object to processing of your personal data for certain purposes

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
cookies.essential_cookies: Essential Cookies: Required for platform functionality and security
cookies.analytics_cookies: Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how you use our platform
cookies.preference_cookies: Preference Cookies: Remember your settings and preferences
cookies.browser_control: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of Safe Bill after any modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using Safe Bill. These terms govern your use of our platform and services.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content1: Welcome to Safe Bill ("we," "our," or "us"). These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our platform that facilitates project management, milestone tracking, and secure payments between buyers and sellers.
introduction.content2: By accessing or using Safe Bill, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account, accessing our platform, or using any of our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
acceptance.agreement: Your continued use of Safe Bill constitutes your acceptance of any updates or modifications to these Terms.

consent_requirements.title: Consent Requirements
consent_requirements.content: By using Safe Bill, you consent to our collection and use of your information as described in our Privacy Policy. You must provide valid consent for all data processing activities in compliance with GDPR regulations.
consent_requirements.cookie_consent: Our platform uses cookies and similar technologies. You must provide consent for non-essential cookies through our consent management platform powered by Axeptio.
consent_requirements.withdrawal: You may withdraw your consent at any time, but this may limit your ability to use certain features of our platform.

service_description.title: Service Description
service_description.content: Safe Bill provides a comprehensive platform for project management and secure transactions between buyers and sellers. Our services include:

features.project_management_desc: Create, manage, and track projects with detailed requirements and specifications
features.milestone_tracking_desc: Set and monitor project milestones with automated payment triggers
features.secure_payments_desc: Process payments securely through integrated payment gateways
features.communication_desc: Built-in messaging and collaboration features for project teams

registration.title: Account Registration
items: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
You must be at least 18 years old to create an account
One person or entity may not maintain multiple accounts

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
items: Maintain accurate and up-to-date account information
Use the platform in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations
Respect the rights and privacy of other users
Report any suspicious or fraudulent activity immediately

payment_terms.title: Payment Terms
payment_terms.content: Safe Bill facilitates secure payments between buyers and sellers. All payment processing is handled through our integrated payment partners.

payment_processing.title: Payment Processing
items: Payments are processed securely through Stripe and other certified payment processors
All transactions are subject to applicable fees as disclosed at the time of payment
Payment disputes are handled according to our dispute resolution process
Refunds are subject to the terms agreed upon between buyers and sellers

payment_terms.refund_policy: Refund requests must be submitted within 30 days of the original transaction and are subject to approval based on project completion status and terms.

prohibited_uses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited_uses.content: You agree not to use Safe Bill for any unlawful or prohibited activities. The following activities are strictly prohibited:

illegal_activities.title: Illegal Activities
items: Money laundering or terrorist financing
Fraud or deceptive practices
Violation of intellectual property rights
Harassment or discrimination

platform_abuse.title: Platform Abuse
items: Creating fake accounts or impersonating others
Attempting to hack or compromise system security
Spamming or sending unsolicited communications
Interfering with other users' legitimate use of the platform

safebill_content.title: Safe Bill Content
safebill_content.content: All content, features, and functionality of Safe Bill, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are owned by Safe Bill and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

user_content.title: User Content
user_content.content: You retain ownership of content you upload to Safe Bill. By uploading content, you grant Safe Bill a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute your content as necessary to provide our services.

service_availability.title: Service Availability
service_availability.content: Safe Bill is provided "as is" and "as available." We do not guarantee that our services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or completely secure. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue services at any time.

third_party_services.title: Third-Party Services
third_party_services.content: Our platform may integrate with third-party services. We are not responsible for the availability, content, or practices of these third-party services. Your use of third-party services is subject to their respective terms and conditions.

limitation_liability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation_liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Safe Bill shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to:
limitation_liability.consequential_damages: Business interruption or loss of business opportunities

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate these Terms at any time. Upon termination, your right to use Safe Bill will cease immediately.

user_termination.title: User Termination
user_termination.content: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting our support team or using the account deletion feature in your settings.

company_termination.title: Company Termination
company_termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account immediately if you violate these Terms or engage in prohibited activities.

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of France, without regard to conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of France.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

updates.title: Terms Updates
updates.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes by email or through our platform. Your continued use of Safe Bill after any modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

billings.title: Billings & Payments
billings.subtitle: Track your payment history and manage your balance
billings.payout_description: Set up your payout schedule, add bank accounts, and manage how you receive payments.
billings.payout_info_1: Set up instant or standard payouts to your bank account
billings.payout_info_2: Configure automatic payout schedules (daily, weekly, monthly)
billings.payout_info_3: Add multiple bank accounts and payment methods
billings.payout_info_4: View payout history and track your earnings
billings.manage_payout_description: Update your payout settings, bank accounts, and schedule preferences
billings.transfer_to_stripe_account: Transfer earnings to your Stripe account
billings.connect_stripe_first: Please connect your Stripe account first to transfer funds
billings.transfer_info_1: Click transfer to send your available balance to your Stripe Connect account
billings.transfer_info_2: Once transferred, manage payout schedules and bank accounts in Stripe Dashboard
billings.transfer_info_3: Stripe handles automatic payouts to your bank account based on your settings
billings.transfer_info_4: All transfers are secure and processed instantly

transfers.title: Transfer History
transfers.subtitle: View your transfer history and status
transfers.no_transfers_description: Your transfer history will appear here once you initiate transfers.

support.title: Support
support.contact_help: We're here to help. Submit a request and our team will get back to you.

notifications.project_started_buyer: Project '{{project_name}}' has been started and is now in progress.
notifications.project_started_seller: You have started project '{{project_name}}' and it is now in progress.
notifications.project_added: You have been added to the project '{{project_name}}' by {{seller_name}}.
notifications.invitation_generated: A new invitation link has been generated for project '{{project_name}}'.
notifications.project_approved_buyer: You have successfully approved the project '{{project_name}}' from {{seller_name}}.
notifications.project_rejected_buyer: You have rejected the project '{{project_name}}' from {{seller_name}}.
notifications.project_completed_milestone: Project '{{project_name}}' is now completed. Last Milestone: {{milestone_name}}, approved.
notifications.payment_processed: Your payment of {{amount}} for project '{{project_name}}' has been processed successfully.
notifications.payment_session_expired: Your payment session for project '{{project_name}}' has expired.
notifications.stripe_verified: Your Stripe account has been successfully verified and is now active. You can now receive payments.
notifications.stripe_disconnected: Your Stripe account has been disconnected. You will no longer be able to receive payments until you reconnect.
notifications.identity_verified: Your identity has been successfully verified!
notifications.identity_verification_failed: Your identity verification has failed. Please try again!
notifications.funds_released: Great news! {{amount}} has been released from hold and is now available for payout.
notifications.transfer_sent: Transfer of {{amount}} {{currency}} has been sent to your Stripe account.
notifications.transfer_reversed: Transfer of {{amount}} {{currency}} was reversed. Reason: {{reason}}. Funds have been returned to your balance.
notifications.dispute_mediator_assigned: Mediator {{mediator_name}} has been assigned to dispute {{dispute_id}}
notifications.dispute_created: A new dispute has been created for project '{{project_name}}'
notifications.dispute_escalated: Dispute {{dispute_id}} has been escalated to admin review
notifications.dispute_created_respondent: A dispute has been filed for project '{{project_name}}' by {{username}}. Dispute ID: {{dispute_id}}
notifications.dispute_created_initiator: Your dispute for project '{{project_name}}' has been created successfully. Dispute ID: {{dispute_id}}
notifications.dispute_mediator_assigned_initiator: Mediator {{mediator_username}} has been assigned to dispute {{dispute_id}}
notifications.dispute_mediator_assigned_respondent: Mediator {{mediator_username}} has been assigned to dispute {{dispute_id}}
notifications.dispute_mediator_assigned_admin_initiato: Mediator {{mediator_name}} ({{mediator_email}}) has been assigned to your dispute: {{dispute_title}}
notifications.dispute_mediator_assigned_admin_responde: Mediator {{mediator_name}} ({{mediator_email}}) has been assigned to your dispute: {{dispute_title}}
notifications.dispute_mediator_assigned_admin_mediator: You have been assigned as mediator for dispute: {{dispute_title}}
notifications.transfer_sent: Transfer of {{amount}} {{currency}} has been sent to your Stripe account.
notifications.transfer_reversed: Transfer of {{amount}} {{currency}} was reversed. Reason: {{reason}}. Funds have been returned to your balance.
notifications.funds_released: Great news! ${{amount}} has been released from hold and is now available for payout.
notifications.stripe_onboarding_complete: Your Stripe account has been successfully verified and is now active. You can now receive payments.
notifications.stripe_account_disconnected: Your Stripe account has been disconnected. You will no longer be able to receive payments until you reconnect.
notifications.identity_verification_success: Your identity has been successfully verified!
notifications.identity_verification_failed: Your identity verification has failed. Please try again!
notifications.payment_processed_buyer: Your payment of {{amount}} for project '{{project_name}}' has been processed successfully.
notifications.payment_session_expired: Your payment session for project '{{project_name}}' has expired.

account_deletion.title: Delete My Account
account_deletion.subtitle: Permanently remove your account and all associated data
account_deletion.please_wait: Please wait while we verify your account status...
account_deletion.preparing: Preparing to check your account status...
account_deletion.eligible_message: Your account meets all requirements for deletion.
account_deletion.enter_password: Please enter your password to confirm this irreversible action.
account_deletion.warning_data_deleted: All your data will be permanently deleted
account_deletion.warning_lost: All projects, payments, and messages will be lost
account_deletion.final_confirmation_message: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible and all your data will be permanently lost.
account_deletion.processing_deletion: Please wait while we process your account deletion...
account_deletion.account_permanently_deleted: Your account has been permanently deleted.
account_deletion.not_eligible_message: Your account cannot be deleted at this time due to the following restrictions:
account_deletion.to_delete_need_to: To delete your account, you need to:
account_deletion.complete_projects: Complete or cancel all active projects
account_deletion.wait_payments: Wait for all pending payments to be processed
